feed.subtitle: Latest updates from the technology world

entry.title: Introduction to WebAssembly
entry.summary: WebAssembly (WASM) is a binary instruction format that enables high-performance applications on the web. Learn how to get started with WebAssembly and integrate it into your web projects.
entry.content: WebAssembly is revolutionizing web development by allowing developers to run code at near-native speed in web browsers. This article explores the fundamentals of WebAssembly and provides practical examples.

entry.title: TypeScript Best Practices
entry.summary: Discover best practices for writing maintainable and scalable TypeScript code, including type definitions, interfaces, and advanced patterns.
